Text: Your resume has been received by Koch IndustriesIncyou for your interest in career opportunities with Koch Industries Inc We are pleased you would consider joining our dynamic entrepreneurial team Your resume has been received and entered into our electronic resume database where it will be accessible by our recruiting staff We review these resumes daily actively searching for talented individuals to help us grow You will not only be considered for the specific role you may have seen advertised but your talents and background will be considered for all of our open roles even those not currently advertised If theres a match we will contact you directly However if you do not hear from us immediately do not worry Even if we dont have the perfect role for you today we will keep your resume for two years which allows us to consider you for future opportunities Would you like to receive announcements of future openings If so please sign up for our Career Agent notification at careeragentasp Also since you were intrigued enough to respond to our posting why not tell others about us as well They can visit us on the Web at Or you may send a personalized email message containing the homepage link for Kochs Career page by clicking here friendasp Thank you again for considering Koch in your career search Good luck and best wishes from the Koch Industries Selection Group
